department.dept_long_name: Committee on Degrees in Social Studies

course.title: Introduction to Social Studies
course.meeting_text: Tu., 2-4, and a weekly section Th., 2-4
course.faculty_text: Richard Tuck, Michael Frazer, and members of the Committee
course.description: This class continues the introduction to the classic texts of social theory begun in Social Studies 10a through the twentieth century. Authors include Friedrich Nietzsche, Max Weber, Emile Durkheim, Sigmund Freud, and Michel Foucault.
course.notes: This course is limited to Social Studies concentrators who have taken Social Studies 10a.
